title: Castles
description: When Maggie was six, she hid from desert storms under a sink where Comet and Windex were kept. Now twenty, she welcomes the storms. Maggie has been abused, torn apart by the sins of others and constantly feels as if she's living on the verge of a grand epiphany. Then again, she may just be insane. She really doesn't know if the four bodies she dismembered and placed inside a rusted Volkswagen Bus are the only bricks left to her castle in the sky, but she hopes you'll understand if they're not.Castles is the story of Maggie and how she built her castle, one brick at a time. It's a literary horror novel about love and redemption, belief and revenge and what brings a person to madness. Set in a nameless desert in a nameless town, it is the view into the life of a young woman who is madness really mad?
author: Benjamin X. Wretlind
